title: AppConfig
description: Advanced options to configure a Client.

$schema.description: JSONSchema for this file, used for external users to validate and test this file.

unsafeModeWhiteList.description: A list of World URLs which can be opened in Unsafe mode with the "OpenUnsafe" command line argument

inputs.description:
Configuration options for the controllers of this App Client.
This will later be moved into in-game settings, as it doesn't make sanse as per-build configuration.

universeId.description: Optionally, specifies which universe this Headless Server will be in.

autoStartWorlds.description: A list of worlds/sessions to start/create when this App Client Starts.

autoJoinSessions.description: A list of rules/ids/urls to use to automatically join sessions when this client starts.

noUI.description: When true, will hide most standard UI from the user.

disableDesktop.description: Disables, the Desktop viewing functionality. Does not disable Desktop Input/Desktop Mode.

pathWhitelist.description: A list of paths which the App can browse in the FileBrowser. Set to an empty array to disable the FileBrowser.

InputConfig.description: Configuration options for a Client's input devices.

triggerDeadZone.description: Adds a deadzone to the triggers of all controllers used by this client.

axisDeadZone.description: Adds a deadzone to the joysticks of all controllers used by this client.

autoDetect.description: Whether to autodetect proxy settings using Internet Explorer's settings.  Defaults to false.

localBypass.description: Whether to bypass the proxy on local domains.  Defaults to true.

bypassDomains.description: List of domains to bypass the proxy with.

address.description: HTTP/S proxy to use for all web requests.

credentialStore.description:
Determines the source of the proxy server's credentials.
Valid options are:
DefaultSystemCache
NetworkCache
UsernamePassword
Defaults to the system cache.

WorldStartupParameters.description: These options are used to configure a startup world from a JSON configuration file.

isEnabled.description: When set to false, this will disable this world entry from starting.

sessionName.description: The name of the session as shown in the World/Session Browser

customSessionId.description: An optional custom session id for this session.

description.description: An optional description of this session, displayed within the world/session browser.

maxUsers.description: The maximum number of users, allowed to join this session.

accessLevel.description: The Access Level for this session please see SessionAccessLevel for more information.

useCustomJoinVerifier.description: Determines whether custom join verifier should be enabled in this session

hideFromPublicListing.description: Determines if this session should be hidden from the world/session browser or not.

tags.description: A list of tags, to assist with searching or discovering sessions.

mobileFriendly.description: Determines if this session is friendly for mobile/quest users.

loadWorldURL.description: When provided with a world URL this will load this world for the session.

loadWorldPresetName.description: When provided and valid, this will load the specified world preset into the session.

overrideCorrespondingWorldId.description: Overrides the world id for this session allowing it to be grouped and displayed with other sessions with this world id.

forcePort.description: Optional, If specified it will force this session to run on a specific network port.

keepOriginalRoles.description: Optional, If specified will keep the original roles as saved in the world.

defaultUserRoles.description: When provided with a list of username and permission pairs it will grant those users the listed permissions when they join.

roleCloudVariable.description:
An optional name of a cloud variable to use to determine the role of this user. 
See our wiki article for more information.

allowUserCloudVariable.description:
An optional name of a cloud variable to use to determine if this user is allowed in the session. 
See our wiki article for more information.

denyUserCloudVariable.description:
An optional name of a cloud variable to use to determine if this user is denied access to the session. 
See our wiki article for more information.

requiredUserJoinCloudVariable.description:
An optional name of a cloud variable to use to determine if this user is denied access to the session. 
See our wiki article for more information.

requiredUserJoinCloudVariableDenyMessage.description:
The name of a cloud variable whose value will be used, When a user is denied access by RequiredUserJoinCloudVariable this message will be displayed to them if present.
See our wiki article for more information.

awayKickMinutes.description: Configures the number of minutes that a user can be away(shelled out) from a world before they are kicked. Setting this to -1 disables this option.

parentSessionIds.description: Provides a list of Parent Session Ids for this session. See our wiki for more info.

autoInviteUsernames.description: Users within this list will automatically be invited to this world when it starts.

autoInviteMessage.description: An automatic message sent to the users on the AutoInviteUsernames list along with their invite.

saveAsOwner.description: Controls who saves this world when it is saved. See, SaveAsOwner for more information.

idleRestartInterval.description:
If this is set(>0) and the world is empty, it will restart regularly using the value to determine the number of seconds between restarts.
Headless only

forcedRestartInterval.description:
If this is set(>0), it will restart regularly using the value to determine the number of seconds between restarts.
Headless only

saveOnExit.description: If set to true will save this world on exit.

autosaveInterval.description:
If this is set(>0), it will automatically save using the value to determine the number of seconds between saves.
Headless only

autoSleep.description:
If set to true, will prevent an empty(or filled with away users) world from running a full update cycle regularily.
Headless only

SessionAccessLevel.description: Used to determine the session access level for a session.

SessionJoinParameters.description: Configuration for a session which should be automatically joined by this client.

url.description: A direct session URL to join. When specified all other checks will be ignored.

sessionId.description: A session ID to join, use "*" to use the other rules to find a session to join.

lanOnly.description: When set to true, will only join LAN sessions.

headlessOnly.description: When set to true, will only join Headless sessions.

onlyUniverseId.description: When set, will only join sessions within this Universe.

autoFocus.description: When set to true, it will automatically focus this session if it is found.
